page.title: 06CARLETT PARK F.E. COLLEGE.
page.content: Carlett Park College was opened in 1952 by the chairman of {Education} committee.The college covers 204,000 square feet.The principal is called Mr. Jackson and he is in charge of three colleges. In the main block there are eight floors.The first floor has electrical work,( computer work etc.) electrical administration on the second, audio visual on the third, classrooms on the fourth,training resturant and kitchens on the fifth,more kitchens on the sixth,class rooms and kitchens on the seventh and managment departments on the eighth. There are about 200 fulltime teaching staff and 200 part time.There also are 200 ancillary staff.Including cooks,cleaners, secretaries etc. It is heated by gas in
